title: राष्ट्रिय प्रकृति संरक्षण कोष ऐन, २०३९
pages: संरक्षण कोष ऐन २०३९ राष्ट्रिय प्रकृतिलालमोहरप्रकशन 7२०३९ | ७  ३संशोधन गर्ने ऐनन्याय प्रशासन ऐन २०४८ २०४८ २| १६ ०र प्रकाशन प्रमणकरण२. केही नेपाल कानून संशोधन गर्ने ऐन २०६३ २०६३  ६ २८सुदृढीकरण तथा केही नेपालगणतन्त्र ३.कानून संशोधन गर्ने ऐन २०६६ - २०६६ ५० ७४. केही नेपाल ऐन संशोधन गर्ने ऐन २०७२ २०७२ | ११| १३नेपालको संविधान अनुकूल बनाउन केही नेपाल+.ऐनलाई संशोधन गर्ने ऐन २०७५ २०७५ | ११| १९अ२०३९ सालको ऐन नं. १२राष्ट्रिय प्रकृति संरक्षण कोषको व्यवस्था गर्न बनेको ऐनव्यवस्थापन गर्नको लागि राष्ट्रिय सम्पदाको   संरक्षण प्रकृति प्राकृतिकतथ र प्रस्तावनसंरक्षण कोष स्थापना गर्न वाञ्छनीय भएकोले प्रकृतिमहाराजाधिराज वीरेन्द्र वीर विक्रम शाहदेवबाट राष्ट्रिय पञ्चायतको श्रसल्लह +सम्मतिले यो ऐन बनाइबक्सेको छराष्ट्रिय प्रकृति संरक्षण कोष ऐन यस   ऐनको संक्षिप्त नाम र प्रारम्भ (१ )नमरहेकोे छ | २०३९(२ ) यो ऐन तुरुन्त प्रारम्भ हुनेछप्रसङ्गले अर्को अर्थ नलागेमा यस ऐनमा,- विषय वा परिभाषाभन्नाले भएको   राष्ट्रिय बमोजिम कोष  (क) प्रकृति३ स्थापन दफसंरक्षण कोष सम्झनु पर्छसमिति , गठन   भएको भन्नाले बमोजिम समितिदफ + सञ्चलकसम्झनु पर्छअध्यक्ष  भन्नाले कोषको अध्यक्ष सम्झनु पर्छयो ऐन संवत् २०६५ साल जेठ १५ गते देखि लागू भएकोेसुदृढीकरण तथा केही नेपाल कानून संशोधन गर्ने ऐन, २०६६ झिकिएकोगणतन्त्र द्वारा

summary: The text discusses various legal documents related to Nepal laws, including the National Nature Conservation Fund Act, the Justice Administration Act, the Nepal Law Amendment Act, and the Constitution Amendment Act. These laws address the establishment and management of funds for nature conservation, the functioning of administrative bodies, and the appointment of officials. The laws also outline the roles and responsibilities of various individuals and organizations involved in conservation efforts.

summary: The text is about the National Nature Conservation Fund Regulations, 2041 published in the Nepal Gazette. It outlines the establishment and operation of the fund, including the appointment of employees, their salaries, and the duties of the fund in conservation activities. The fund can also engage citizens in contractual work for conservation purposes and provide benefits to employees as per regulations. Additionally, it emphasizes coordination with government and non-government entities for conservation activities and creating awareness among the public for nature conservation.

summary: The text outlines the various amendments made to the National Broadcasting Regulations in Nepal, starting from 2052. The amendments cover a wide range of topics related to broadcasting services, including satellite television, distribution systems, and internet protocols. The regulations also specify the methods of program distribution, including through satellite centers and ground stations. The amendments aim to regulate the broadcasting industry and ensure compliance with the law.

summary: The text discusses the National Natural Resources and Financial Commission Act, 2074, and the amendment process. It highlights the responsibilities and powers of the Commission in relation to national natural resources and financial matters. The Act also outlines the roles of the Chairman, members, and the use of expert advice in decision-making. Additionally, it emphasizes the coordination between the federal, provincial, and local governments in resource management and decision-making processes.
